text.streak.lost: You lost your perfect fishing streak of {{streak}}.
text.streak.warning: Catch the treasure and the fish to keep your streak of {{streak}}!
text.streak.restored: You kept your perfect fishing streak!
text.config.hud.name: HUD
text.config.hud.desc: Configure how the fishing HUD looks
text.config.hud.showFishingHud.name: Show fishing HUD
text.config.hud.showFishingHud.desc: Whether or not to show current streak, chance for treasure, chance for each fish, etc. while fishing.
text.config.hud.topLeftX.name: Top left X
text.config.hud.topLeftX.desc: The X coordinate of the top left corner of the fishing HUD.
text.config.hud.topLeftY.name: Top left Y
text.config.hud.topLeftY.desc: The Y coordinate of the top left corner of the fishing HUD.
text.config.hud.maxFishTypes.name: Max fish types
text.config.hud.maxFishTypes.desc: The number of fish to show on the fishing HUD.
text.config.hud.showTrash.name: Show trash
text.config.hud.showTrash.desc: Whether to show trash in the fishing HUD.
text.config.fish.name: Fish
text.config.fish.showFishInMinigame.name: Show fish in minigame
text.config.fish.showFishInMinigame.desc: Whether to show the fish being caught in the fishing minigame.
text.config.fish.globalDartFrequencyFact: Modifier for the dart frequency (difficulty) of all fish.
text.config.fish.catchSpeed.name: Catch speed
text.config.fish.catchSpeed.desc: Affects how fast you catch fish.
text.config.fish.drainSpeed.name: Drain speed
text.config.fish.drainSpeed.desc: Affects how fast the catch bar drains when the bobber isn't on the fish.
text.config.fish.streakForIncreasedQuali: Required streak for an increase in quality. For example, 3 means that every 3 consecutive perfect catches increases your catch quality by 1. A value of 0 or less disables any quality increase from your perfect fishing streak. (You still get a quality increase for perfectly catching a fish though.)
text.config.fish.maxNormalFishQuality.de: The max quality fish a non-perfect catch can get. Non-perfect catches can't get above gold quality (regardless of this setting).
text.config.fish.maxFishQuality.name: Max fish quality
text.config.fish.maxFishQuality.desc: The max quality fish that can be caught. 0 = normal, 1 = silver, 2 = gold, 3 = iridium, 4+ = beyond iridium.
text.config.fish.fishChances.name: Chances of hitting a fish
text.config.fish.fishChances.desc: Configuration options for how likely it is to hit a fish instead of trash.
text.config.treasure.name: Treasure
text.config.treasure.desc: Configure how treasure caught while fishing works
text.config.treasure.maxTreasureQuantity: Maximum amount of treasure you can find in a single chest while fishing.
Whether the treasure randomizer should be allowed to select the same loot option multiple times. Some loot can't be repeated even if duplicate loot is enabled.
text.config.treasure.invertChancesOnPerf: Whether to invert the chances of each treasure entry when you get a perfect catch and treasure chest at the same time. For example, when this is enabled, getting a perfect catch and treasure chest together would make an item that normally has a 1% chance of showing in a chest instead have a 99% chance of appearing.
text.config.treasure.catchSpeed.name: Catch speed
text.config.treasure.catchSpeed.desc: Affects how fast you catch treasure.
text.config.treasure.drainSpeed.name: Drain speed
text.config.treasure.drainSpeed.desc: Affects how fast the treasure bar drains when the bobber isn't on the chest.
text.config.treasure.treasureChances.des: The chances of finding treasure while fishing.
text.config.treasure.additionalLootChanc: The chances of getting additional loot when finding treasure. This is rolled until it fails or the max number of items have been added to the loot.
text.config.chances.baseChance.name: Base chance
text.config.chances.streakFactor.name: Streak factor
text.config.chances.streakFactor.desc: The effect that streak has on this chance. This is multiplied by the streak and added to the chance.
text.config.chances.fishingLevelFactor.d: The effect that fishing level has on this chance. This is multiplied by the fishing level and added to the chance.
text.config.chances.dailyLuckFactor.name: Daily luck factor
text.config.chances.dailyLuckFactor.desc: The effect that daily luck has on this chance. This is multiplied by the daily luck and added to the chance.
text.config.chances.luckLevelFactor.name: Luck level factor
text.config.chances.luckLevelFactor.desc: The effect that luck level has on this chance. This is multiplied by the luck level and added to the chance.
text.config.chances.minChance.name: Minimum chance
text.config.chances.maxChance.name: Maximum chance
text.config.chances.locationFactors.desc: The effects that specific locations have on the chance must be edited directly in the config file. They are added to the final chance.
text.config.chances.treasure.magnetFacto: The effect that the magnet bait has. This is added to the chance if fishing with a magnet.
text.config.chances.treasure.treasureHun: The effect that the treasure hunter tackle has. This is added to the chance if fishing with the treasure hunter tackle.
